overview:
Patrick Riley is a co-founder of Modern Survey and currently serves as Chief Executive Officer. Modern Survey is one of the fastest growing SaaS companies in the Twin Cities (Fast 50 and Inc 500|5000). Patrick has nearly twenty years of experience in enterprise technology and is an expert in emerging web technology trends. His industry expertise has been tapped in the past by organizations such as National Public Radioâ€™s â€œMarketplace,â€ the Star Tribune and Talent Management Magazine.

Patrick’s leadership and vision have been on display for years in his many contributions to the arts and to his community. Patrick is an accomplished filmmaker and musician. He has played in rock & roll bands, worked as a writer and producer in the film and television industry in Minneapolis, New York, Los Angeles and at the Sundance Filmmaker’s Lab, and has volunteered his time and energy to the Interact Center and Center for Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment. Patrick earned his BS degree in communication arts from the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison.
